text:
@AprilDRyan @realDonaldTrump You know what @AprilDRyan. The "essential service" you said about that church is a hotspot for the Virus. That is not true our president knows what's best .

WE AT CHURCH HAVE CRISTLIFE NOT CORONAVIRUS BECAUSE NOBODY ELSE HAS THE CROWN JUST OUR GOD JESUS HAS THE CROWN...KING.
